name: Crosshatch Girl Study (4x Upscale)
description: Transform your photo into a detailed pencil and charcoal line sketch portrait with expressive hand-drawn artistry + fast 4x upscale (2 credits)

default_prompts.image_edit: Use Image A as a high-fidelity facial reference for likeness and fine features (not strict identity lock). Create a highly detailed pencil and charcoal head-and-shoulders sketch of a young woman, gently forward-facing with a slight head tilt, large expressive eyes, and a soft warm smile. Enforce traditional hand-drawn style with visible graphite/charcoal strokes, layered cross-hatching, varied bold and fine lines, and tonal depth built only through sketch shading. Hair should be voluminous and slightly messy with many individually drawn strands and natural pencil flow. No photorealism, no digital airbrushing, no vector lines, no color painting ‚Äî maintain organic paper texture and natural drawing imperfections. Lightly suggest simple fantasy-inspired fabric with minimal detail to keep focus on the face. Background: warm paper tone with soft vignette, no hard elements. Preserve accurate facial proportions, eyes, lips, and bone structure from Image A in charcoal-pencil form. Ultra-detailed, studio quality, clean composition, no blur, no color fill, no cartoon style, no plastic skin, no AI artifacts.
default_prompts.upscale: Ultra high-resolution charcoal pencil sketch portrait, fine cross-hatching strokes, expressive tonal shading, paper grain texture, art-studio quality, 8K, HDR

steps.name: upscale
steps.description: Fast 4x upscale with Stability AI (2 credits)
